snp1.4:5.3: Na kho pana mayaṃ → na kho pana samaṇa (s1-3), balībadde → balivadde (bj, pts1) | balibaddhe (s1-3, c1)
snp1.4:16.2: sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati → saṃdhūmāyati sampadhumāyati (s1) | saṃdhūmāyati sampadhūmāyati (s2, s3)
snp1.4:16.3: divasaṃ santatto → divasasantatto (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
snp1.4:18.6: Aññataro ca → aññataro ca kho (bj, pts1) | aññataro kho (s1-3, km, mr)
